DepositWithdraw.title: Deposit / Withdraw
DepositWithdraw.IRTAllowable: The minimum amount must be {{min}} IRT and the maximum {{max}} IRT.
DepositWithdraw.IRTText: The invoice with the amount of {{amount}} IRT is created on {{date}}, {{time}. you will be directed to the payment portal through the green button below. To create a new invoice, pay or cancel the previous invoice.
DepositWithdraw.IRTFormText: To deposit, first, create an invoice, the allowed amount of the deposit is at least {{min}} IRT and at most {{max}} IRT.
DepositWithdraw.allowableWithdraw: Minimum allowable withdrawal amount has not been observed.
DepositWithdraw.DepositTETHContentBefore: Ropsten network ETH test Only accepted! For free download
DepositWithdraw.DepositTETHContentAfter: go to send a test ETH to this address. You must change your wallet Etherium network to Ropsten. This network is on the Metamask wallet network list by default. Any transaction with an amount equal to or greater than 0.001 ETH to the above address will be added to your account.
DepositWithdraw.minDepositText: Any transaction with a value greater than {{min}} {{currency}} will be added to your account at the following address.
DepositWithdraw.DepositTBTCContentBefore: Only BTC test accepted! For free download
DepositWithdraw.DepositTBTCContentAfter: go to any transaction with an amount equal to or greater than 0.001 BTC to the above address will be added to your account.
DepositWithdraw.DepositTUSDTContentBefore: Only USDT Ropsten Network Test is accepted! To learn how to get free,
DepositWithdraw.DepositTUSDTContentAfter: Go. To send a USDT test to this address, you must change your wallet atrium network to Ropsten. This network is on the Metamask wallet network list by default. Any transaction with an amount equal to or greater than From 10 USDT to the above address will be added to your account.
DepositWithdraw.depositTime: * Your balance will increase {{time}} minutes after depositing to the above address.
DepositWithdraw.securityConsiderations: Due to security considerations, the transfer to the account may be delayed slightly. You can see the withdrawal status on the same page in the Deposit / Withdrawal Transactions section.

IPGErrorCode.13003: You are not allowed to pay.

PersonalProfile.title: Personal Profile
PersonalProfile.cantEdit: Your authentication is complete. Your cannot edit your profile.

ChangePassword.title: Change Password
ChangePassword.confirmationError: New password and confirm password don't match.
ChangePassword.currentPasswordError: Current password has been entered incorrectly.

SetTwoStepVerification.title: Set Two Step Verification
SetTwoStepVerification.initialCodeMin: The code must be 6 digits long.
SetTwoStepVerification.description: If two-step login is enabled, a two-step password will be requested for each login to the user panel.
SetTwoStepVerification.QRdescription: Scan the QR code using the Google Authenticator software (or similar), enter the 6-digit number and register.

HelpStep.title: Step 1 of 4: User's Guide
HelpStep.content: In order to use all services of this exchange and activate withdrawing option, your identity must be verified. The authentication process is simple and online. In the next steps, you will be asked to enter your personal information in the relevant form. Enter and send the pictures, ID card and the agreement letter.

PersonalProfileStep.title: Step 2 of 4: Enter Your Personal Information.
PersonalProfileStep.serverError: Error retrieving information, please try again.
PersonalProfileStep.wrongNationalId: You personal ID number is incorrect!

SendPhotosStep.title: Step 3 of 4: Send Pictures
SendPhotosStep.content: To complete the authentication, please follow the steps below:
SendPhotosStep.acceptForm: 1) Write the agreement letter to use the services on an A4 paper, sign and take a photo of it.
SendPhotosStep.selfie: 2) Take a selfie of yourself holding the agreement letter in front of your chest.
SendPhotosStep.idCard: 3) Take a selfie of yourself holding a birth certificate or ID card in front of your chest.
SendPhotosStep.idCardDropzone: Selfie with a birth certificate or ID card
SendPhotosStep.imageAcceptedFormat: - Please upload photos in JPEG and PNG format only!
SendPhotosStep.imageAcceptedSize: - The maximum acceptable size for uploading the photos is 1 MB!
SendPhotosStep.acceptFormEmpty: Upload a photo of the agreement letter!
SendPhotosStep.selfieEmpty: Upload a selfie with the print of your agreement letter in your hands!
SendPhotosStep.idCardEmpty: Upload a selfie with your ID card!

SendToAdminStep.title: Step 4 of 4: Send to Admin
SendToAdminStep.content: Profile registered successfully. Your authentication status is as follows:
